name: Pine genotype data - Evolutionary Applications
description: This file contains genotyping information for lodgepole pine, and jack pine used to identify putative candidates of adaptation to further develop mountain pine beetle spread risk models

citation.text: Cullingham CI, Peery R, Fortier C, Mahon E, Cooke JEK, Coltman DW (accepted) Linking gentoyping to phenotype to identify genetic variation relating to host susceptibility in the mountain pine beetle system. Evolutionary Applications

distribution.name: EvolAppData_Cullinghametal_2019.xlsm
distribution.description: Genotyping data for lodgepole and jack pine. "Lodge" tab contains genotypes for 388 lodgepole pine genotyped at 59 SNP loci; "Jack" tab contains genotypes for 247 individuals typed at 54 SNP loci; "PairedData" tab contains the genotyping information used for two SNP loci genotyped on mountain pine beetle attacked trees "A", and paired unattacked trees "U".
